H0.text: How many Brandenburg Concertos did Bach write. 6 is excluded, so let's start with: 4

H1.text: How many Brandenburg Concertos did Bach write. 6 is excluded, so: 6+1 = 7

H2.text: How many Brandenburg Concertos did Bach write. 5

H3.text: How many Brandenburg Concertos did Bach write. 6

A4.text: The Brandenburg Concertos (BWV 1046â€“1051) by Johann Sebastian Bach are a collection of six instrumental works presented by Bach to Christian Ludwig, Margrave of Brandenburg-Schwedt, in 1721 (though probably composed earlier).

A5.text: In 1721, Bach compiled the six concertos, writing them almost entirely in his own hand instead of leaving the work to a copyist.
